name: Bad Guys at School
storyline:
In Bad Guys at School, play as students who will do anything to become a member of the "Bad Guys". In multiplayer mode, you can also play as a teacher and stop his students from wreaking havoc on the school. 
 
Each game takes place in several stages during which students and teachers confront each other in common missions. 
 
Students will have to accomplish missions given by the "Bad Guys" while teachers will make sure to maintain order. Each victory will allow you to acquire additional content that will improve your game experience: Skateboard, mobile phone, paint spray... or items to give your character a makeover (jeans, jackets, emotes...).
summary: Play as a young student in search of respect from the "Bad Guys", the most badass group in high school. For this, complete missions in high school or in the city.
